Posts.EditableText: How do I look for specific games without the search bar? Is there a way I can find the nsfw ones too? I only see games by genre and only a few sets
Posts.HTML: How do I look for specific games without the search bar? Is there a way I can find the nsfw ones too? I only see games by genre and only a few sets

Posts.EditableText:
The search box is there. (about half way down on the RHS - called Google Custom Search ) What does "nsfw" mean? 
All the categories are listed below the search box and also across the top.
